price: (112) And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.[1299]
footnotes: [1299]- This verifies that the firstborn son who was to be sacrificed was Ishmael and not Isaac, as claimed by the Jews and Christians.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

translations: And We gave him glad tidings
